works.title: Employee Management System
works.description: Developed a comprehensive Employee Management System to manage employee data, attendance, leave, permits, and payroll.
works.role: PT Media Sarana Data | Feb 2016 – Dec 2019
works.impact: Streamlined HR processes, reducing manual workload and improving data accuracy and accessibility.

works.title: Barcode Inventory System
works.description: Developed a Barcode Inventory System to control product stock, manage rejected goods, and oversee export processes.
works.impact: Enhanced inventory accuracy, streamlined product tracking, and improved management’s ability to make data-driven production decisions.

works.title: Top-Up Management and PPOB Purchase System
works.description: Developed a 24/7 top-up management and PPOB purchase system for resellers with automatic payment verification.
works.role: CV Putmasari Pratama (Telkomsel Authorized Dealer) - Freelance
works.impact: Enhanced user experience by enabling instant transactions and increased operational efficiency with automation.

works.title: Electricity Certification Registration and Scheduling System
works.description: Developed a registration and scheduling system for electricity certification integrated with the Dirjen Ketenagalistrikan API.
works.impact: Improved efficiency in managing certification processes and ensured compliance with regulatory requirements.
